documentation.text: @dev We want token names to be unique across markets, so we keep track of them in a seperate map

@dev Initializes the contract
 @param owner The owner of the contract

@dev Returns the amount of existing markets
 @return The amount of existing markets
@dev We want token names to be unique across markets, so we keep track of them in a seperate map

@dev Initializes the contract
 @param owner The owner of the contract

@dev Returns the amount of existing markets
 @return The amount of existing markets

devdoc.author: Alexander Schlindwein
devdoc.details: Manages the creation, exchange and interest distribution of IdeaTokens. Sits behind a proxy

addMarket(string,address,uint256,uint256.details: Adds a new market. May only be called by admin

params.baseCost: : The initial cost in Dai per IdeaToken in the first interval
params.nameVerifier: The address of the name verifier
params.priceRise: : The price rise in Dai per IdeaToken per completed interval
params.tokensPerInterval: : The amount of IdeaTokens in each interval

getMarketDetailsByID(uint256).details: Returns the market details by the market id

getMarketDetailsByName(string).details: Returns the market details by the market name

getMarketIDByName(string).details: Returns the market id by the market name

getNumMarkets().details: Returns the amount of existing markets

getTokenIDByName(string,uint256).details: Returns the token id by the token name and market id

getTokenIDPair(address).details: Returns the token id pair by the tokens address

getTokenInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Returns the token info by the token id and market id

isValidTokenName(string,uint256).details: Checks whether a token name is allowed and not used already

params.marketID: The market on which the token is to be listed

returns._0: True if the name is allowed, false otherwise

setPlatformFee(uint256,uint256).details: Sets the platform fee for a market

params.marketID: The market id for which to set the platform fee

setTradingFee(uint256,uint256).details: Sets the trading fee for a market

params.marketID: The market id for which to set the trading fee

_tokenNameUsed.details: We want token names to be unique across markets, so we keep track of them in a seperate map

devdoc.title: IdeaTokenFactory
